tool_description:
経路検索数や直近の検索傾向を基にした駅の1日分の混雑度や、混雑予測情報を取得できます。
Return information on congestion levels and congestion forecasts for a day at the station based on search log count and recent search trends.
name: NAVITIME Congestion Prediction
title: NAVITIME Congestion Prediction

api_list.name: transport_node
api_list.description: キーワードや住所など、条件に該当する駅の一覧を取得します

required_parameters.name: word
required_parameters.description:
Search word.

When multiple conditions are specified, the search is performed in the order of AND condition and OR condition.
Truncate after 51 characters.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of response data. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 100, Default value: 10)

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description:
Additional output information.
(detail: detailed information on stations)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Skips a given number of first data.
(Minimum value: 0, Maximum value: 1000, Default value: 0)

optional_parameters.name: address
optional_parameters.description:
Address Code.
Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

api_list.name: congestion_prediction/node
api_list.description:
駅IDと日付を指定して、特定の駅の経路検索数や直近の検索傾向を基にした1日分の混雑度を取得します
（指定日の午前3時から指定日翌日の午前2時までを1日分とします）

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description:
Node ID.

Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

api_list.name: congestion_prediction/date
api_list.description: 期間や駅IDなどの条件を指定して、経路検索数を基にした鉄道駅の混雑度予測情報を取得します

optional_parameters.name: direction
optional_parameters.description: Arrival and departure (start: departure, goal: arrival)

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description:
Node ID.

Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: ratio
optional_parameters.description: Congestion ratio (minimum value: 0, maximum value: 2.0, narrowed down to congestion ratios above the specified value; if less than 2.0 is specified, the id must be specified)
